title: Between The Buried And Me - Coma Eclipti  2015
description:
Coma Ecliptic is the upcoming seventh full-length studio album by American progressive metal band Between the Buried and Me, to be released on July 7, 2015 through Metal Blade Records. The band first announced the album through Twitter on September 8, 2014 saying "It has begun! #rockopera" Similar to previous releases by the band, Coma Ecliptic will be a concept album. The first single, "Memory Palace" was released on April 3, 2015.

Contents

    1 Overview
    2 Track listing
    3 Personnel
        3.1 Between the Buried and Me
    
Overview

The band has stated that the concept of Coma Ecliptic will involve a man stuck in a coma, journeying through his past lives. It was added that the man faces a choice to either stay or move on to something better. Each song will be its own episode in a sort of "The Twilight Zone-esque" fashion.
